    • Method Detail

      • setMaximumStates

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setMaximumStates(int states)
        Parameters:
        states - The maximum number of states the Crawler should crawl. The default is unlimited.

      • setUnlimitedStates

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setUnlimitedStates()
        Crawl without a maximum state limit.

      • setMaximumRunTime

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setMaximumRunTime(long time,
                                                                   TimeUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        time - The maximum time the crawler should run. Default is one hour.

      • setUnlimitedRuntime

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setUnlimitedRuntime()
        Set the maximum runtime to unlimited.

      • setMaximumDepth

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setMaximumDepth(int depth)
        Parameters:
        time - The maximum depth the crawler can reach. The default is 2.

      • setUnlimitedCrawlDepth

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setUnlimitedCrawlDepth()
        Set the crawl depth to unlimited. The default depth is 2.

      • addPlugin

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder addPlugin(Plugin... plugins)
        Add plugins to Crawljax. Note that without plugins, Crawljax won't give any ouput. For basic output at least enable the CrawlOverviewPlugin.

        You can call this method several times to add multiple plugins

        Parameters:
        plugins - the plugins you would like to enable.

      • setProxyConfig

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setProxyConfig(ProxyConfiguration configuration)
        Parameters:
        configuration - The proxy configuration. Default is ProxyConfiguration.noProxy()

      • crawlRules

        public CrawlRules.CrawlRulesBuilder crawlRules()
        Returns:
        The CrawlRules.CrawlRulesBuilder to define crawling rules. If no specified, Crawljax will do CrawlRulesBuilder#

      • setBrowserConfig

        public CrawljaxConfiguration.CrawljaxConfigurationBuilder setBrowserConfig(BrowserConfiguration configuration)
        Parameters:
        configuration - a custom BrowserConfiguration. The default is a single EmbeddedBrowser.BrowserType.firefox browser.

      • build

        public CrawljaxConfiguration build()

      • buildControl

        public CrawlController buildControl()
